entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
